Sodashi Cell Renewal Drops

Brand: Sodashi

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: : lavandula angustifolia (lavender), aniba roseodora (rosewood), pelargonium graveolens (geranium), alcohol (ethanol, pure cane spirit), tocopherol (vitamin E), citrus limon (lemon).

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental
ncer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
